table.name: TB_LANGUAGE

row.name: CD_LANGUAGE
row.comment: Informs Language's code. e.g. EN | FR | ES | AR | PT

row.name: DE_LANGUAGE
row.comment: Language's description. e.g. English | French | Spanish | Arab | Portuguese | ...

row.name: ID_LANGUAGE_LEVEL
row.comment: Informs Langue's level. e.g. A1.1 | A1.2 | B1.2 | ...

table.comment: This table stores User's data table Language. e.g. English(EN), French(FR), Spanish(ES), Arabe(AR), Portuguese(PT), ...

table.name: TB_LANGAUGE_LEVEL

row.name: CD_LANGUAGE_LEVEL
row.comment: Informs Language level's code. e.g. A1.2 | A1.2 | B1.2 | ...

row.name: DE_LANGUAGE_LEVEL
row.comment: Informs Language level's description. e.g. English 1 | English 2 | French 1 | ....

table.comment: This table stores Langue level's data table. e.g. A1.1, A1.2, B1.1, B1.2, ...

table.name: TB_USER

row.name: NM_COMPLETE_NAME
row.comment: informs User's Complete Name. e.g. John Doe

row.name: DE_SEX
row.comment: Informs User's Sex. e.g Male | Female | Trans | Other ...

row.name: DE_CPF
row.comment: Informs User's CPF i.e. Brasilian individual registration e.g. 999.999.999-99

row.name: DE_CNPJ
row.comment: Informs User's CNPJ i.e. Brasilian company registration e.g 99.999.999/9999-99

row.name: DE_EMAIL
row.comment: Informs User's e-mai.l e.g. john@doe.com

row.name: DE_TELEPHONE
row.comment: Informs User's Telephone. e.g. (+55)61-3123-4567

row.name: DE_CELLPHONE
row.comment: Informs User's Cellphone. e.g. (+55)61-91234-5678

row.name: DE_ADDRESS
row.comment: User's Address e.g. Rua Pinheiros, 700, São Paulo, SP

row.name: DE_PASSWORD
row.comment: Informs the password to login. e.g. P@ssw0rd

row.name: DE_PASSWORD_REMEMBER
row.comment: Informs users a text to remember the password. e.g. What is my favorite hoby?

row.name: TP_REGISTER
row.comment: Informs User's register type i.e. whether the use has been saved using or not an upload file.

row.name: DT_REGISTER
row.comment: Informs the date when the information has been saved. e.g. 14/09/2020

row.name: ID_PROFILE
row.comment: Informs User's profile. e.g. Administrator(Adm)

row.name: ID_STATUS
row.comment: Informs User's status. e.g. Enabled (Enbl)

row.name: ID_OFFICE_TOWN
row.comment: Informs User's office town. e.g. São Paulo (SP)

row.name: ID_LANGUAGE_FIRST
row.comment: Informs User's first language of interest (required). e.g. English (A1.1)

row.name: ID_LANGUAGE_SECOND
row.comment: Informs User's second language of interest (optional). e.g. French (B.1.2)

row.name: ID_LANGUAGE_THIRD
row.comment: Informs User's third language of interest (optional). e.g. Spanish (A1.2)

row.name: ID_NATIONALITY
row.comment: Informs User's nationality. e.g. Brazilian | Syrian | ...

row.name: ID_ADDITIONAL_INFO
row.comment: Informs User's additional Informations. e.g. Nationality | bank account | ...

row.name: ID_BANK_ACCOUNT
row.comment: Informs user's bank account for person or company who wil be contracted.

table.comment: This table stores User's data

table.name: TB_PROFILE

row.name: CD_PROFILE
row.comment: Informs Profile's code. e.g. PROF | ADM | ...

row.name: DE_PROFILE
row.comment: Informs Profile's description. e.g. Professor | Admnistrator | Students | Coordinator |...

row.name: ID_ACCESS_RIGHT
row.comment: Informs the access right of the profile.

table.comment: This table stores User's data table Profiles. e.g. Administrator(ADM), Coordinator(COOD), Professor(PROF), Student(STUD), Visitor(VIST),...

table.name: TB_OFFICE_TOWN

row.name: CD_OFFICE_TOWN
row.comment: Informs Office town's code. e.g SP | RJ | ...

row.name: DE_OFFICE_TOWN
row.comment: Informs Office town's description. e.g. São Paulo | Rio de Janeiro | ...

row.name: ID_OFFICE
row.comment: Informs the Office where the course will happen. e.g. Pinheiro (PINH) | Tatuapé (TATU) | ...

table.comment: This table stores Users's data table Abraço Cultural Office Town where the user has been registred. e.g. São Paulo(SP), Rio de Janiero(RJ), ...

table.name: TB_OFFICE

row.name: CD_OFFICE
row.comment: Informs Office's code. e.g. PINH | TATU | ...

row.name: DE_OFFICE
row.comment: Informs Office's description. e.g. Pinheiro | Tatuapé | ...

table.comment: This table stores Abraço cultural's Office referenced to the Office's Town. e.g. Pinheiros(PINH), Tatuapé(TATU) ...

table.name: TB_STATUS

row.name: CD_STATUS
row.comment: Informs Status' code. e.g. DISBL | ENBL

row.name: DE_STATUS
row.comment: Informs Status' description. e.g. Disabled | Enabled

table.comment: This table stores User's Status. e.g. Enabled(ENBL), Disabled (DISBL), ...

table.name: TB_CONTRACT

row.name: DE_CONTRACT_CODE
row.comment: Informs a unique code for the contract according to the information passed. e.g. 1Sem20_SP_PINH_EN1_EXT_SEG-TER_19H_01H30

row.name: HR_CLASS_BEGIN
row.comment: Informs (in Hour) when the class will begin. e.g. 09h30

row.name: HR_CLASS_END
row.comment: Informs (in Hour) when the class will end. e.g. 12h45

row.name: HR_CLASS_BREAK
row.comment: Informs (in Minute) the break time in case exists one. e.g. 15mn for the break | default 0mn

row.name: HR_CLASS_TIME
row.comment: Informs (in Minute) the total class time. e.g. 1h30 of class = 90mn

row.name: HR_CLASS_WEEKLY_TIME
row.comment: Informs (in Minute) total class time per week. e.g. 03h of class/week = 180mn/week

row.name: HR_CLASS_PACKAGE
row.comment: Informs (in Hour) the total package of hours contracted by the student. e.g. 40h of class

row.name: DT_CLASS_BEGIN
row.comment: Informs the date when the class will effectively begin.

row.name: DT_CLASS_END
row.comment: Informs the date when the class will effectivily end.

row.name: DE_COMMENT
row.comment: Informs note in the case there is something to comment about the contract (optional).

row.name: FG_CLOSED_CONTRACT
row.comment: Flag to finalize a contract. e.g. True = finalize | False = available (Default) .

row.name: DT_REGISTER
row.comment: Informs the date when the information has been saved e.g. 30/10/2020

row.name: ID_CLASS_DAY_FIRST
row.comment: Informs the first class day in the week. e.g. Monday(MON) | Wednesday(WED) |Saturday(SAT) | ...

row.name: ID_CLASS_DAY_SECOND
row.comment: Informs the second class day in the week (opcional). e.g. Tuesday(TUE) | Thursday(THU) | ...

row.name: ID_OFFICE_TOWN
row.comment: Informs the Abraço Cultural Town. e.g. SP | RJ | ...

row.name: ID_OFFICE
row.comment: Informs the class Office. e.g. PINHEIROS | TATUAPE | ...

row.name: ID_MODULE
row.comment: Informs class' module information. e.g. Particular | Extensive | Intensive ...

row.name: ID_MODULE_TYPE
row.comment: Informs the class' module type information. e.g. presencial | online | Mix ..

row.name: ID_LANGUAGE
row.comment: Informs the teaching language e.g. French | English ...

row.name: ID_LANGAUGE_LEVEL
row.comment: Informs the teaching language e.g. French (FR) | English (EN) ...

row.name: ID_CLASS_TYPE
row.comment: Informs the class type description. e.g. Course (CRS) | Workshop (WRK) | ...

table.comment: This table stores contract's data. Students as well as professor must sign a term of contract before to begin a class.

table.name: TB_CONTRACT_MODEL

row.name: NM_CONTRACT_MODEL
row.comment: Informs Contract model's name. e.g. Student Contract for private class

row.name: DE_CONTRACT_MODEL
row.comment: Informs Contract model's description i.e. Contract content

row.name: DT_REGISTER
row.comment: Informs the date when the information has been saved e.g. 30/11/2020

table.comment: This table stores Contract model's data. The model of a contract can be diferent according to the user perfil or the person or company who is contracted.

table.name: TB_STUDENT

row.name: DE_PAYMENT_DISCOUNT
row.comment: Informs if there will be a discount in the payment. e.g. User can save R$100 as a discount to the total value if he/she did more than two modules of a determinate language class.

row.name: FG_RECEIVE_BOOK
row.comment: Flag to inform whether the student has already received his book or not.

row.name: FG_RECEIVE_CERTIFICATE
row.comment: Flag to inform whether the student has already received his certificate or not at the end of the course.

row.name: FG_SIGN_CONTRACT
row.comment: Flag to inform whether the student has already signed the contract or not.

row.name: DT_REGISTER
row.comment: Informs the date when the information has been saved. e.g. 14/09/2020

row.name: ID_CONTRACT
row.comment: Informs student's contract.

row.name: ID_PAYMENT
row.comment: Informs Student's payment form e.g. Parcel (x4) with credit card | cash | ...

row.name: ID_PAYMENT_TYPE
row.comment: Informs student's payment type i.e. the way that the student will pay the value of the course

row.name: ID_CONTRACT_MODEL
row.comment: Informs student's contract model.

row.name: ID_EVALUATION
row.comment: Informs the evaluation note by the Student.

table.comment: This table stores some students information related to the contract i.e. student subscribed in any language class.

table.name: TB_PAYMENT

row.name: DE_PAYMENT
row.comment: Payment description e.g Parcel (x1) | Parcel (x4) | Cash | Free (scholarship) | ...

table.comment: This table stores information about payment

table.name: TB_PAYMENT_TYPE

row.name: TP_PAYMENT
row.comment: Payment type e.g. Money | Transfert | Credit card | Bank slip | PagSeguro| Paypal | Free |...

table.comment: This table stores informations about Payment type.

table.name: TB_CONTRACTED

row.name: DT_REGISTER
row.comment: Informs the date when the information has been saved. e.g. 14/09/2020

row.name: ID_PERSON
row.comment: Informs the person or company contracted.

row.name: ID_CONTRACT
row.comment: Informs the contract assigned to the person or company contracted.

row.name: ID_PAYMENT
row.comment: Informs the Payment for the person or company contracted.

row.name: ID_PAYMENT_TYPE
row.comment: Informs the payment type for the person or company contracted.

row.name: ID_CONTRACT_MODEL
row.comment: Informs Contract model for the person or company contracted.

row.name: ID_EVALUATION
row.comment: Informs the evaluation note by the person or the company contracted.

table.comment: This table stores informations about the person or the company who signed the contract.

table.name: TB_MODULE

row.name: CD_MODULE
row.comment: Class module's code. e.g. EXT | INT | PRV | INC | ONL | ...

row.name: DE_MODULE
row.comment: Class module description e.g. Intensive, Extensive, Private, Incompany...

table.comment: This table stores class module information. Module's name is given to a class according to: the teaching period, the teaching place, the number of student.

table.name: TB_MODULE_TYPE

row.name: CD_MODULE_TYPE
row.comment: Module's type code e.g. "ONL" for Online class | "PRS" for Presencial class | "MIX" for Presencial and Online class.

row.name: DE_MODULE_TYPE
row.comment: Module's type description e.g. "Online" class | "Presencial" class | "Mix" for presencial and online class.

table.comment: This table stores class module type information i.e. a class can be presencial or online or Mix (presencial and online).

table.name: TB_CLASS_DAY

row.name: CD_CLASS_DAY
row.comment: Informs the code of class day. e.g. MON | TUE | WED | THU | FRI | SAT

row.name: DE_CLASS_DAY
row.comment: Informs the description of the class day. e.g. Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursdays, Friday, Sunday

table.comment: this tables is responsible to store all class day code and descriptin. e.g. Monday(MON), Wednesday(WED), ....

table.name: TB_ADDITIONAL_INFO

row.name: DE_PROFESSION
row.comment: Informs User's profession. e.g. Architect | Students | Graphic Designer | ...

table.comment: This table stores Additional information about the user.

table.name: TB_NATIONALITY

row.name: CD_NATIONALITY
row.comment: Informs User's nationalty. e. g. Brazilian | Syrian | ...

row.name: DE_NATIONALITY
row.comment: Informs User's nationalty. e. g. Brazilian | Syrian | ...

table.comment: This table stores User's nationality.

table.name: TB_CLASS_TYPE

row.name: CD_CLASS_TYPE
row.comment: Informs class type code. e.g. CRS | WRK | ...

row.name: DE_CLASS_TYPE
row.comment: Informs the class type description. e.g. Course | Workshop | ...

table.comment: This table stores the class type data for the contract.

table.name: TB_BANK_ACCOUNT

row.name: DE_AGENCY
row.comment: Informs User's bank agency

row.name: DE_ACCOUNT
row.comment: Informs User's bank account.

row.name: ID_BANK_NAME
row.comment: Informs user's Bank name. e.g. Itaú | Brasdesco | ...

table.comment: This table Stores informations about user's bank account. this information will help to pay the contracted the person or the company contracted.

table.name: TB_BANK_NAME

row.name: NM_BANK
row.comment: Informs user's bank name. e.g. Banco do Brasil | Itaú | Brasdesco | ....

table.comment: This table stores User's bank name

table.name: TB_PRESENCE

row.name: DT_PRESENCE
row.comment: Informs the class date to mark the presence.

row.name: ID_CONTRACT
row.comment: Informs the contract.

row.name: ID_CONTRACTED
row.comment: Informs the person or the company contracted.

row.name: ID_STUDENT
row.comment: Informs the Student to fill the presence list.

row.name: ID_PRESENCE_TYPE
row.comment: Informs Presence type. e.g. Presence (P) | Absent (A) | ...

table.comment: This table stores information about user's presence according to the class type (see TB_CASS_TYPE).

table.name: TB_PRESENCE_TYPE

row.name: CD_PRESENCE
row.comment: Informs presence type. e.g. "P" for presence | "A" for Absent | ...

row.name: DE_PRESENCE
row.comment: Informs Presence type description. e.g. Presence | Absent | ...

table.comment: This table stores the Presence's type for presence table.

table.name: TB_EVALUATION

row.name: ID_EVALUATION_TYPE
row.comment: Informs the type of evaluation.

row.name: DE_EVALUATION_POINT
row.comment: Informs the evualation point. e.g. "07,50" /10

row.name: DE_EVALUATION_POINT_TOTAL
row.comment: Informs the evualation total point. e.g. 07,50 / "10"

row.name: DE_COMMENT
row.comment: informs the evaluation's comment. e.g. this Student is very attentive... | This professor teach very well ...

row.name: DT_REGISTER
row.comment: Informs the date when the information has been saved. e.g. 14/09/2020

table.comment: This table stores information about evaluation for student and person or company contracted.

table.name: TB_EVALUATION_TYPE

row.name: TP_EVALUTION
row.comment: Informs the type of evaluation. e.g. Oral | Scores | Home works | Tests | ...

table.comment: This table stores information about the type of evaluation.

table.name: TB_POST

row.name: NM_POST
row.comment: Informs the post name (title of the post).

row.name: DE_POST
row.comment: Informs the post contennt. Post could have media content.

row.name: DT_REGISTER
row.comment: Informs the date when the information has been saved. e.g. 14/09/2020

row.name: ID_PROFILE
row.comment: Informs what perfil might see the post.

row.name: ID_USER
row.comment: Informs the author of the post. e.g. Post is written by "John Doe"

row.name: ID_POST_TYPE
row.comment: Informs the post type.

table.comment: This table stores information (like a feed) wich can be posted by coordinator to another perfil.

table.name: TB_POST_TYPE

row.name: NM_POST_TYPE
row.comment: Informs the name of post type. e. g. Chat | Email | Publicity | Feed | Advise | ...

table.comment: This table informs the type of te post.

table.name: TB_ACCESS_RIGHT

row.name: FG_USER
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to User's page.

row.name: FG_PROFILE
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Profile's page.

row.name: FG_STATUS
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Status' page.

row.name: FG_OFFICE_TOWN
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Office Town's page.

row.name: FG_OFFICE
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Office's page.

row.name: FG_LANGUAGE
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Language's page.

row.name: FG_LANGUAGE_LEVEL
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Language Level's page.

row.name: FG_NATIONALITY
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Nationality's page.

row.name: FG_ADDITIONAL_INFO
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Additional Info's page.

row.name: FG_BANK_ACCOUNT
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Bank Account's page.

row.name: FG_BANK_NAME
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Bank Name's page.

row.name: FG_ACCESS_RIGHT
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Access Right's page.

row.name: FG_POST
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Post's page.

row.name: FG_POST_TYPE
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Post Type's page.

row.name: FG_CONTRACT
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Contract's page.

row.name: FG_CLASS_DAY
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Class Day's page.

row.name: FG_MODULE
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Module's page.

row.name: FG_MODULE_TYPE
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Module Type's page.

row.name: FG_CLASS_TYPE
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Class Type's page.

row.name: FG_CONTRACT_MODEL
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Contract Model's page.

row.name: FG_STUDENT
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Student's page.

row.name: FG_CONTRACTED
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to "Contracted" page.

row.name: FG_PAYMENT
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Payment's page.

row.name: FG_PAYMENT_TYPE
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Payment Type's page.

row.name: FG_PRESENCE
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Presence's page.

row.name: FG_PRESENCE_TYPE
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Presence Type's page.

row.name: FG_EVALUATION
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Evaluation's page.

row.name: FG_EVALUATION_TYPE
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Evaluation Type's page.

row.name: FG_POST
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Post's page.

row.name: FG_POST_TYPE
row.comment: Informs whether perfil have access right to Post Type's page.

table.comment: This table sotres information about the access right according to the user profile.
